sentences.en: He was kept in appalling conditions in prison.
sentences.cn: 他被关在环境极其恶劣的监狱中。

sentences.en: Helicopters fly in appalling weather to succour shipwrecked mariners.
sentences.cn: 直升机在恶劣的天气条件下起飞前去援救遇难的船员。
她穿衣打扮的品位实在糟透了。

sentences.en: I am an absolutely appalling speller.
Rebellions were put down with appalling barbarity.
sentences.cn: 叛变被残酷地镇压了下去。
卫生条件之差令人震惊。

sentences.en: She suffered appalling burns to her back.
The battlefield was a scene of appalling bloodshed.
sentences.cn: 战场上一片恐怖的屠杀景象.

sentences.en: The manners of many doctors were appalling.
The prisoners were living in appalling conditions.
sentences.cn: 囚犯的居住条件极为恶劣。

sentences.en: The prospect of waiting around just twiddling his thumbs was appalling.
sentences.cn: 想到将要无所事事，他就非常害怕。

sentences.en: The search was hampered by appalling weather conditions.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的天气妨碍了搜寻工作.

sentences.en: They have been living under the most appalling conditions for two months.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在恶劣不堪的条件下生活两个月了。

sentences.en: They reacted to the appalling weather with typical British stoicism.
sentences.cn: 他们忍受着恶劣天气的煎熬,表现了英国人典型的坚忍不拔的精神.
